sub_title: Center of Excellence P2P (Purchase to Pay) specialist at Nike
summary:
Position: Center of Excellence S2P specialist – Nike European Operations NL BV

Current Focus:
- Be the Subject Matter Expert in driving the roll out of a new corporate card with new payment method to Europe and deployment of a new T&E expense tool. This includes requirement gathering and validation, design and configuration, training materials, support communication strategy and involving all stakeholders and steering committee.
- Participate and contribute with expertise on GAP analysis, deployment scenarios (Corp Card, Payment method, Country waves and payment reconciliation solutions). Pinpoint priority areas to focus and dependencies in the process of deploying a new XM tool, IBCP and new corporate card even as these evolve into separate but complementary projects
- Support, lead and manage an operating team in both India and Bucharest. Perform On-Job-training continuously

profile_positions.description:
- As a proces matter expert lead and coordinate a project of outsourcing all accounts payable activities to a third party
- Perform On-Job-Training to third party
- Coordinate roll out of AP activities all EMEA countries to third party
- Support, lead and manage an operating team in both India and Bucharest
- Analyze performance and optimize processes. Ensure appropiate policies and procedures are implemented to safe guard assets.
- Provide relevant reports and information for high level meetings and presentations
- Lead Roll-out project of Travel & Expense tool to Eastern European countries
profile_positions.title: Center of Excellence P2P specialist

profile_positions.description:
- Manage a team of 8 individuals responsible for all Accounts Payable activities; setting direction, communcate, motivate, support and develop people’s skills. Manage and prioritize workload, set deadlines and share feedback
- Project lead for: centralization of the expense process in Europe, Upgrade of Travel&Expense tool, Corporate card payment method change for EMEA, Roll out of Travel&Expense tool to Turkey- Czech Republic and Slovakia
- Ensure all controls are applied and maintained (SOX)
- Ensure accounting accuracy for monthly, quarterly and annual results 
- Re-assess internal processes and share open feedback with stakeholders where the process requires changes or improvement for the overall benefit of the origanization
profile_positions.title: Teamlead Accounts Payable

profile_positions.description:
- Booking invoices, running payment proposals, being a business point of contact for payment or system queries
- Key player in the transition of a manual expense process to a digital process. This includes training to end-users (+/- 1000 employees), configuration, testing, end user support
- Project lead for roll out of Expense tool to all Western European countries. This includes transition management, end user training, configuration of 20 different entities. Being the first point of contact for all technical issues
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable Specialist
